(S (NP-TPC-2 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الحل) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC الآني)) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يكمن) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN انشاء) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN شركات) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN مختلطة)) (ADJP (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN اميركية) (PUNC -) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN لبنانية)))

arg.g: The establishment of joint ventures for the American Lebanese
